title: Flipped Learning-Based Research Proposal Writing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental research methodologies and administrative management experience
context.additional_context: Practical Research Proposal Writing Training Program for Working Professionals. Scenario-Based Learning in Simulation/VR Environments Mimicking Real Work Situations

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain the research proposal writing process in a flipped learning environment based on the ADDIE model.
Learners can independently write proposals—including research objectives, methodology, and anticipated outcomes—using VR simulations.
Learners can improve the logical coherence and practicality of proposals through peer feedback and project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
